Articles.Content:
Just wondering what everyone's favorite features with the expansion are so far.  

Personally, I would say the new parts, and that's mostly on account of the engine plates.  They're just a great solution for engine clustering and engines with different form factors, and actually better than anything I recall seeing in a mod.  

At some point in the future I might change my response to "playing community-created missions," once those really get going.

Yup, new parts.  Specifically the Engine Plates will have the most impact on how I play KSP in the future.  I feel bad for those people who don't have the expansion because those (at least the 1.25m, 2.5m, and 3.7m) seem like something that should probably be in the base game.  They're quickly replacing decouplers on most applications for me, and they will be found on most of my rockets going forward to be sure.

 

As an aside, EVA parachutes came with the base game update 1.4, not the expansion.

Edited March 25, 2018 by klesh

8 minutes ago, klesh said:

As an aside, EVA parachutes came with the base game update 1.4, not the expansion.

Thanks for that - good to know.  But I think I'll just leave it in here as a generally "new" feature.
Engine plates are freat. Should be stock, though.
